body.p: The IASB also decided that a seller-lessee should apply the approach to gain or loss recognition on sale and leaseback transactions in IFRS 16 (described in paragraph BC266) only to sale and leaseback transactions entered into after the date of initial application of IFRS 16. The IASB concluded that the costs of applying a retrospective approach would outweigh the benefits in terms of reported information.
